original_title: R.M.A.L. Rathnayake appointed Chairman of the Election Commission
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); R.M.A.L. Rathnayake has been appointed as the new Chairman of the Election Commission.
R.M.A.L. Rathnayake had previously served as an assistant commissioner at the Election Commission.
Retired Supreme Court Justice L.T.B. Dehideniya has been appointed as the chairman of the Human Rights Commission of Sri Lanka.
The Appointment was made by the President based on the recommendations made by the Constitutional Council.
Air Vice Marshal Udeni Rajapaksa appointed as the 19th Commander of the Sri Lanka Air Force
Governor of the Central Bank Dr. Nandalal Weerasinghe explains debt restructuring process
